text: Sardinas Airport is an airport serving one of the many oil production facilities in the Casanare Department of Colombia. The nearest population center is Orocué, southeast of the runway. ==See also== * * *Transport in Colombia *List of airports in Colombia ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Sardinas *FallingRain - Sardinas Airport * * Category:Airports in Colombia Category:Colombia transport-related lists
title: Sardinas Airport
